nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Choice points appear: electives, clubs, the kind of classes you take. It feels heavy to pick.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Do I follow what others choose, pick what's safe, or follow curiosity?

choices.text: Do what most friends choose so I don't stand out.
Pick safe, predictable choices to avoid risk.
Try something that genuinely interests me, even if it's odd.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You fit in easily but sometimes feel disconnected from what you enjoy.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Predictability brings comfort, but you wonder what you might miss.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Trying new things sparks energy. You meet others who share weird interests and feel alive.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Decisions are experiments, not final verdicts. Curiosity keeps options open.
